note:
I research gender, CS & engineering, entrepreneurship, among other topics.

Based at the University of Copenhagen in Anthropology and Social Data Science

I'm currently writing a book: "Render the World: Coding Exclusions in Computer Science Education", to be published with the University of Toronto Press.

Profile photo: An orange cat sitting infront of a balcony with a 1-2 foot high snow bank, seeming wistful.

Header photo: a field of sunflowers.
